v8:item.v8:content: Available fields of the grouped fields
Page of the unavailable grouped fields
Current item can not contain the grouping field. In the structure tree, select a grouping for which it is required to view or change the grouping fields structure.
The current item has individual settings of the selected fields (for the detailed item setting)

The selected fields for the current item will be generated automatically according to the selected fields of the whole report. In the structure tree, select an item - report for editing its selected fields. If you want the current item to have selected fields that differ from the selected report fields, select the check box above the text.
The selected fields can not be set for the current item. In the structure tree, select an item - report for editing its selected fields.
The current item has individual filter (to filter records displayed in the item)
Filter is not set in the current item. In the structure tree, select a report to edit the report filter. If you want the current item to have its own filter, select the check box above the text.
The filter can not be set for the current item. In the structure tree, select a report to edit the report filter.
The current item has individual sort (to sort records displayed in the item)

The sorting is not set in the current item . In the structure tree, select a report to edit the report sorting. If you want the current item to have its own sorting, select the check box above the text.
Sorting can not be set for the current item. In the structure tree, select a report to edit the report sorting.
Current item has own conditional appearance (to register the records displayed in the item)
Page of the disabled conditional appearance

The conditional apperance is not set in the current item. In the structure tree, select a report to edit the conditional appearance of the report. If you want the current item to have its own conditional appearance, select the check box above the text.
Page of the unavailable conditional appearance
The conditional appearance can not be set for the current item. In the structure tree, select a report to edit the conditional appearance of the report.
Current item has individual additional settings
Page of the disabled additional settings

Additional settings are not set in the current item. Select in the structure tree the report for editing the additional settings of the report in general. If you want the current item to have its own additional settings, select the check box above the text.
Click here to proceed to the additional report settings.
Page of the unavailable additional settings
Additional settings can not be set for the current item. Select in the structure tree the report for editing the additional settings of the report in general.
Click here to proceed to the additional report settings.
